verses.text: Ix vak' pensar to ol in ya'ilej in b'eyb'al, yic max och in mul yuj tas svala'. Tzin yamoch vaan in ti' yacb'an ayek' eb' anima chuk spensar t'a vichanh.
Ix in em numnajoc, majxo valpaxlaj wach' lolonel. Palta haxo in yaelal ix te nivtaji.
Vanxo stz'a in pixan ix vab'i. Yacb'an van in te naub'tanhani, ix wach' och pitz'an t'a in pixan. Yuj chi' chaanh ix in avaji, ix valani:
Mamin Jehová, ak' val vojtaquejeli to chamel b'a vaji, to jayenhej ab'il in q'uinal. In gana snachajel vuuj to elanhchamel tzek'b'at in q'uinal.
Quennhej in q'uinal ix ak'a'. Manh nivanoclaj in q'uinal t'a ichanh. Ha onh anima onh tik, icha val quik'an jab'oc quik', icha chi' co q'uinal.
Icha veven caj co masanil. Nab'anhej sco mak' k'unb'oc co b'a. ¿Tocval scak' co gana yet' co b'eyumal sco molb'ejq'ue b'ulan? Manh cojtacoc mach ol ik'ancanb'atoc.
Mamin Vajal, haxo ticnaic, ¿tas wach' svak'och yipoc in k'ool? Ha ach ton ayach och yipoc in k'ool.
Colinel t'a masanil in chukal. Manh in a cha b'uchjoc yuj eb' chuk spensar.
Icha val eb' max ujilaj sloloni, icha chi' ix vutej in b'a. Manhxalaj tas ix elta t'a in ti', yujto a ach tik ix ak'och juntzanh tik t'ayin.
Iq'uel in yaelal ix ak'ochi. Vanxo in lajviel svab' yuj b'aj ix in a mak'a'.

Ha ach tzak'och co yaelal a onh anima onh tik. Tzak'anoch co tz'uumal yuj co mul. Ha ach tzak' lajvoc tas nib'ab'il cuuj, ichato tz'ijaxb'ati. Co masanil, icha val quik'an quik', icha chi' yek' co q'uinal.

Mamin Jehová, ab' in lesal tik, cotanh q'uelan t'ayin ayic svalan in b'a t'ayach. Manh ak' sat a k'ool t'a yal in sat tik. Mamin, a t'ayach, eq'uelb'anhej vek' t'a sat lu'um tik icha eb' in mam vicham.
Mamin, manh ak'cot a k'ak'alk'olal t'ayin, yic wach' tzin tzalaj junok rato, yacb'an manto el-laj in k'ool.
